title: SCCM Training
description: Mindmajix SCCM online training enables you to gain proficiency in implementing the SCCM. In this SCCM online classroom training, you will get fundamental knowledge of configuration manager site system roles, exploring sccm console, configuring network firewall settings, and SQL database server installation. During this course, you will work with two live projects to acquire hands-on knowledge of configuring boundaries and client assignments, deploying configuration manager clients, configuring software and hardware inventory. In this SCCM online instructor-led training, you will learn some advanced concepts like mobile device management, implementing endpoint protection, configuring power management, and configuration manager site maintenance overview. Join our SCCM training, and become a Microsoft Certified System Center Configuration Manager.
what_will_learn: |Get an overview of the functionality of System Center Configuration Manager 2016 and its key features|Configure and manage the client Installation process and Status|Configure SQL Server Reporting Services to run queries and reports|Configure, manage, and troubleshoot application deployment|Perform backup and recovery of configuration manager 2016 site |Deploy and manage software updates|Deploy the application to mobile devices|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Microsoft SCCM course?The prerequisites for learning Microsoft SCCM are listed below:

The participant should be familiar with networking fundamentals including TCP/IP and DNS.
The participant should have knowledge of deployment, configuration, and troubleshooting of Windows.
target_students: |Windows Administrators|System Administrators |IT professionals|Desktop Engineers|Professionals who want to extend their skill set with advanced technologies.|
